import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const DrawerView = ({ _id, username, profilePicture, location, perspective }) => { const photo = require(profilePicture) console.log(perspective) return

{username}

  • Profile
  • Scheduler
  • My Trips

} DrawerView.propTypes = { _id: PropTypes.string.isRequired, username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, profilePicture: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, perspective: PropTypes.bool.isRequired } export default DrawerView
